sentences.en: A child was toddling along the sidewalk.
sentences.cn: 一个小孩正沿着人行道蹒跚行走。

sentences.en: All the wet, snowy sidewalk was bright with this radiated fire.
sentences.cn: 整个泥泞积雪的人行道都被这片灯光照亮了.

sentences.en: dog poop on the sidewalk
sentences.cn: 便道上的狗屎

sentences.en: Don't spit on the sidewalk.
sentences.cn: 别在人行道上吐痰.

sentences.en: He avoided stepping on the crack in the sidewalk.
sentences.cn: 他避免踩到人行道的裂缝上.

sentences.en: He stood on the sidewalk with his hands buried in the pockets of his dark overcoat.
sentences.cn: 他站在人行道上，双手插在黑色外套的口袋里。

sentences.en: Just then a taxi drew up to the sidewalk.
sentences.cn: 一会儿就驶来了一辆“的”.

sentences.en: No. I fell right onto a concrete sidewalk.
sentences.cn: 不.我直接掉到了坚硬的人行道上.

sentences.en: Pedestrians keep to the sidewalk [ footpath ] !
sentences.cn: 行人走 便道.

sentences.en: Pieces of paper were skittering along the sidewalk.
sentences.cn: 人行道上飞舞着一张张纸片。

sentences.en: She tripped over the bump on the sidewalk.
sentences.cn: 她被人行道上一块隆起的地面绊了一下.

sentences.en: She walked along the sidewalk.
sentences.cn: 她沿着人行道走着。

sentences.en: The blind man tapped his cane on the sidewalk.
sentences.cn: 盲人用手杖敲击人行道。

sentences.en: The children squared off the sidewalk to play hopscotch.
sentences.cn: 孩子们在人行道上划出方格,做“跳房子”的游戏.

sentences.en: The workmen were cementing the sidewalk.
sentences.cn: 工人们在人行道上浇筑水泥.

sentences.en: Then I noticed he was on the sidewalk behind me.
sentences.cn: 然后在人行道上我注意到他在我后面。

sentences.en: Then we precarious moved on toward the sidewalk, where she pulled my face down to hers, kissed me on both cheeks, and then limped away, still smiling and waving back to me.
sentences.cn: 这时，我们蹒跚地向人行道走去，她把我的脸拉向她的脸，在我两颊上各吻了一下，然后一瘸一拐地离开了，还不时地回头向我微笑和挥手。

sentences.en: They stood about the sidewalk now and jeered.
sentences.cn: 现在,他们站在人行道上嘲笑着.

sentences.en: Two men and a woman were walking briskly down the sidewalk toward him.
sentences.cn: 两名男子和一名女子正轻快地沿人行道朝他走过去。

sentences.en: We had to be mindful of every step we took on slippery sidewalk.
sentences.cn: 在很滑的边道行走时,我们每行一步都必须小心.

sentences.en: We stopped the pudgy kid in the middle of the sidewalk and surrounded him.
sentences.cn: 我们在人行道的中间挡住了这个小胖墩儿的去路，将他围住。

trans.tran_en: a hard surface or path at the side of a street for people to walk on
